name: Life Redemption
description:
《Life Redemption 》is a survival game in which you act as the sister who saves the sister, and you use the sword as a melee weapon to fight the zombies
The main feature of the game is in the grim and terrible environment, in the face of a sudden attack of zombies and duel, find the lock sister's prison door key, save sister.
"My sister said she had a dream to be a heroine one day. In my opinion, she will always be the hero in my heart.
That was a bad man to a secret experiment biochemical zombie abandoned manor, it is sister that brave and resolute heart saved us, escape from the terrible zombie cage.
Maybe we are all ordinary people, but we have a brave heart to face them!"
Features:
1. An immersive environment to save the environment: experience the lonely feelings of salvation in a dark environment
2. Free exploration: you can search for any house in the scene
3. Melee weapon control: use the sword to fight the zombies, face the sudden zombies, you can save yourself
4. Gunfire tracking of outdoor scenes: let you escape from all kinds of escapes
5. Scene sound layout: let you experience the feeling of cold and scare
